system.description:
Trigger: The user's HP is greater than 1/3 of their Max HP.

Effect: The user sacrifices HP equal to 1/3 of their Max HP and gains +1 ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF and SPD stage for 5 activations.

actions.name: Clangorous Soul

cost.trigger: The user's HP is greater than 1/3 of their Max HP.
